title: I got my last refer to level 10 2 days before Refer-a-friend ended, it never registered...
body:
So with the Refer-a-friend ending I thought I'd get some people from school to start playing League and use my refer link when they signed up. We mostly played bot matches to get level 10 quick and the last guy got level 10 2 days before the Refer-a-friend ended and I never got the chance to Claim Medieval Twitch on the website :c, was just checking if I could do anything to get it? Like, Riot checking my account for refers or something? Or maybe I should just wait for them to be added in the Social unlock thing...

EDIT: I received the skin, TY RIOT <3
